This is to certify that M/s REDTONE Telecommunications (Pvt.) Limited has challenged the Show Cause Notice No.PRA/REDTONE/5067 dated 27.10.2023 issued by Additional Commissioner Enforcement-II, Punjab Revenue Authority, Lahore, before Honorable Lahore High Court Lahore in Writ Petition No.34587 of 2023 titled “M/s REDTONE Telecommunications Vs. The Province of Punjab, etc.”, wherein vide order dated 03.11.2023 Honorable Justice Mr. Abid Aziz Sheikh, has restrained the department from passing any final order till the next date of hearing. Attested copy of the order shall be provided as and when available.
